Text: This album sounds like a bunch of poorly recorded, badly mixed, studio jams, that Hendrix never intended to become available for public consumption. This is not 'Experience' or "Rainbow Bridge' quality work.

@ xybrite  

Check this one out.. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5436140/

This One Might Be Better for You

@ xybrite  everyone knows its not going to be new material,we know its just recordings of songs previously released,but like all hendrix fans we like to hear them none the less.If he Jimi was to fart into a bottle,I'd want to hear it,because I'd bet it would sound good!! lol

xybrite ??? huh?

I was very surprised of this versions of songs, some of them I have never heards.
The recordings and mixes are very good. Much higher quality then other old "original" stuff.

Definetily something for Hendrix fans but also for other blues rockers alike :-)
